channel.title: Copilot-Chat on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Copilot-Chat on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GPT-5.3-Codex is now available in github.com, GitHub Mobile, and Visual Studio
item.description:
GPT-5.3-Codex is generally available for GitHub Copilot paid tiers and can be used via Copilot Chat across github.com, GitHub Mobile, and Visual Studio.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Improved web search in Copilot on github.com
item.description:
Copilot Chat on github.com now supports model-native web search for certain models, allowing those models to use their built-in web browsing capability during chats.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Showing tool calls and other improvements to Copilot chat on the web
item.description:
GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com now shows tool call details in chat responses and includes additional performance and UX improvements.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub has made the GPT-5.1-Codex-Max model generally available in GitHub Copilot for Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. The model can be used in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com and GitHub Mobile.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Auto model selection for Copilot in JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Copilot now offers an Auto model selection option in Copilot Chat for JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse. Selecting Auto lets Copilot choose the most appropriate model for you; the feature is available in public preview.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: vscode: Open Source AI Editor: Second Milestone
item.description:
Ghost text suggestions have been open sourced as part of the Copilot Chat extension — the second milestone toward making VS Code an open source AI editor.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code

item.title: github: Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5 is now generally available inside GitHub Copilot. The model can be accessed in GitHub Copilot Chat and is available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+ customers.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Upcoming deprecation of Claude Sonnet 3.5
item.description:
GitHub will deprecate Claude Sonnet 3.5 across all Copilot experiences (including Copilot Chat, inline edits, ask and agent modes, and code completions) on November 6, 2025. The change signals a move to newer, more capable models. The announcement appeared on The GitHub Blog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Claude Sonnet 4.5 is now available in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse
item.description:
Claude Sonnet 4.5 is available in public preview through GitHub Copilot Chat for users on Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise plans, and can be used in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot in VS Code August release (v1.104)
item.description:
The August 2025 update (v1.104) for GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code delivers improvements aimed at greater flexibility, security, and productivity in AI-powered development workflows, and includes auto model selection in Copilot Chat.

  • Source: GitHub
